function.name: mqtt.publish
function.description: Publishes a message to an MQTT topic.

function.name: mqtt.dump
function.description: Writes all messages on a specific topic into the `mqtt_dump.txt` file in your configuration folder.

function.name: mqtt.reload
function.description: Reloads MQTT entities from the YAML-configuration.

function.name: ffmpeg.stop
function.description: Sends a stop command to a ffmpeg based sensor.

function.name: ffmpeg.restart
function.description: Sends a restart command to a ffmpeg based sensor.

function.name: ffmpeg.start
function.description: Sends a start command to a ffmpeg based sensor.

function.name: rest.reload
function.description: Reloads REST entities from the YAML-configuration.

function.name: todo.add_item
function.description: Add a new to-do list item.

description.example: A more complete description of the to-do item than that provided by the summary.

function.name: todo.get_items
function.description: Get items on a to-do list.

function.name: todo.remove_item
function.description: Remove an existing to-do list item by its name.

function.name: todo.update_item
function.description: Update an existing to-do list item based on its name.

description.example: A more complete description of the to-do item than that provided by the summary.

function.name: todo.remove_completed_items
function.description: Remove all to-do list items that have been completed.

function.name: adguard.remove_url
function.description: Removes a filter subscription from AdGuard Home.

function.name: adguard.add_url
function.description: Add a new filter subscription to AdGuard Home.

function.name: adguard.disable_url
function.description: Disables a filter subscription in AdGuard Home.

function.name: adguard.enable_url
function.description: Enables a filter subscription in AdGuard Home.

function.name: adguard.refresh
function.description: Refresh all filter subscriptions in AdGuard Home.

function.name: shopping_list.add_item
function.description: Adds an item to the shopping list.

function.name: shopping_list.clear_completed_items
function.description: Clears completed items from the shopping list.

function.name: shopping_list.complete_item
function.description: Marks the first item with matching name as completed in the shopping list.

function.name: shopping_list.incomplete_item
function.description: Marks the first item with matching name as incomplete in the shopping list.

function.name: shopping_list.complete_all
function.description: Marks all items as completed in the shopping list (without removing them from the list).

function.name: shopping_list.incomplete_all
function.description: Marks all items as incomplete in the shopping list.

function.name: shopping_list.sort
function.description: Sorts all items by name in the shopping list.

function.name: shopping_list.remove_item
function.description: Removes the first item with matching name from the shopping list.

function.name: valve.set_valve_position
function.description: Moves a valve to a specific position.

function.name: script.turn_on
function.description: Runs the sequence of actions defined in a script.

function.name: script.toggle
function.description: Toggle a script. Starts it, if isn't running, stops it otherwise.

function.name: hassio.addon_update
function.description: Updates an add-on. This service should be used with caution since add-on updates can contain breaking changes. It is highly recommended that you review release notes/change logs before updating an add-on.

function.name: lawn_mower.dock
function.description: Stops the mowing task and returns to the dock.

function.name: remote.learn_command
function.description: Learns a command or a list of commands from a device.

function.name: remote.send_command
function.description: Sends a command or a list of commands to a device.

function.name: remote.delete_command
function.description: Deletes a command or a list of commands from the database.

function.name: homeassistant.reload_custom_templates
function.description: Reloads Jinja2 templates found in the `custom_templates` folder in your config. New values will be applied on the next render of the template.

function.name: homeassistant.reload_all
function.description: Reload all YAML configuration that can be reloaded without restarting Home Assistant.

function.name: homeassistant.check_config
function.description: Checks the Home Assistant YAML-configuration files for errors. Errors will be shown in the Home Assistant logs.

function.name: homeassistant.toggle
function.description: Generic service to toggle devices on/off under any domain.

function.name: homeassistant.update_entity
function.description: Forces one or more entities to update its data.

function.name: homeassistant.save_persistent_states
function.description: Saves the persistent states immediately. Maintains the normal periodic saving interval.

function.name: homeassistant.reload_core_config
function.description: Reloads the core configuration from the YAML-configuration.

function.name: homeassistant.turn_off
function.description: Generic service to turn devices off under any domain.

function.name: homeassistant.turn_on
function.description: Generic service to turn devices on under any domain.

function.name: scene.reload
function.description: Reloads the scenes from the YAML-configuration.

function.name: zha.issue_zigbee_cluster_command
function.description: Issues a command on the specified cluster on the specified entity.

function.name: zha.warning_device_squawk
function.description: This service uses the WD capabilities to emit a quick audible/visible pulse called a "squawk". The squawk command has no effect if the WD is currently active (warning in progress).

function.name: zha.warning_device_warn
function.description: This service starts the operation of the warning device. The warning device alerts the surrounding area by audible (siren) and visual (strobe) signals.

function.name: zha.remove
function.description: Removes a node from the Zigbee network.

function.name: zha.issue_zigbee_group_command
function.description: Issue command on the specified cluster on the specified group.

function.name: zha.clear_lock_user_code
function.description: Clears a user code from a lock.

function.name: zha.set_lock_user_code
function.description: Sets a user code on a lock.

function.name: zha.enable_lock_user_code
function.description: Enables a user code on a lock.

function.name: zha.permit
function.description: Allows nodes to join the Zigbee network.

function.name: zha.set_zigbee_cluster_attribute
function.description: Sets an attribute value for the specified cluster on the specified entity.

function.name: zha.disable_lock_user_code
function.description: Disables a user code on a lock.

function.name: conversation.process
function.description: Launches a conversation from a transcribed text.

function.name: cast.show_lovelace_view

function.description: Say something using text-to-speech on a media player with cloud.

function.name: tts.google_translate_say
function.description: Say something using text-to-speech on a media player with google_translate.

function.name: extended_openai_conversation.query_image
function.description: Take in images and answer questions about them

function.name: recorder.enable

function.name: recorder.disable
function.description: Stops the recording of events and state changes.

function.name: recorder.purge_entities
function.description: Starts a purge task to remove the data related to specific entities from your database.

function.name: template.reload

function.name: media_player.turn_off
function.description: Turns off the power of the media player.

function.name: media_player.turn_on
function.description: Turns on the power of the media player.

function.name: media_player.repeat_set
function.description: Playback mode that plays the media in a loop.

function.name: media_player.shuffle_set
function.description: Playback mode that selects the media in randomized order.

function.name: media_player.media_seek
function.description: Allows you to go to a different part of the media that is currently playing.

function.name: media_player.join
function.description: Groups media players together for synchronous playback. Only works on supported multiroom audio systems.

function.name: media_player.volume_mute
function.description: Mutes or unmutes the media player.

function.name: media_player.unjoin
function.description: Removes the player from a group. Only works on platforms which support player groups.

function.name: media_player.select_source
function.description: Sends the media player the command to change input source.

function.name: light.turn_on
function.description: Turn on one or more lights and adjust properties of the light, even when they are turned on already.

function.name: light.turn_off
function.description: Turn off one or more lights.

function.name: light.toggle
function.description: Toggles one or more lights, from on to off, or, off to on, based on their current state.

function.name: input_button.press
function.description: Mimics the physical button press on the device.

function.name: number.set_value
function.description: Sets the value of a number.

function.name: cloud.remote_disconnect
function.description: Disconnects the Home Assistant UI from the Home Assistant Cloud. You will no longer be able to access your Home Assistant instance from outside your local network.

function.name: cloud.remote_connect
function.description: Makes the instance UI accessible from outside of the local network by using Home Assistant Cloud.

function.name: homekit.unpair
function.description: Forcefully removes all pairings from an accessory to allow re-pairing. Use this service if the accessory is no longer responsive, and you want to avoid deleting and re-adding the entry. Room locations, and accessory preferences will be lost.

function.name: frontend.set_theme
function.description: Sets the default theme Home Assistant uses. Can be overridden by a user.

function.name: camera.play_stream
function.description: Plays the camera stream on a supported media player.

function.name: camera.record
function.description: Creates a recording of a live camera feed.

function.name: camera.snapshot
function.description: Takes a snapshot from a camera.

function.name: alarm_control_panel.alarm_arm_custom_bypass
function.description: Arms the alarm while allowing to bypass a custom area.

function.name: alarm_control_panel.alarm_arm_home
function.description: Sets the alarm to: _armed, but someone is home_.

function.name: alarm_control_panel.alarm_arm_night
function.description: Sets the alarm to: _armed for the night_.

function.name: alarm_control_panel.alarm_arm_vacation
function.description: Sets the alarm to: _armed for vacation_.

function.name: alarm_control_panel.alarm_arm_away
function.description: Sets the alarm to: _armed, no one home_.

function.name: automation.trigger
function.description: Triggers the actions of an automation.

function.name: logbook.log
function.description: Creates a custom entry in the logbook.

function.name: vacuum.turn_off
function.description: Stops the current cleaning task and returns to its dock.

function.description: Starts, pauses, or resumes the cleaning task.

function.name: vacuum.clean_spot
function.description: Tells the vacuum cleaner to do a spot clean-up.

function.name: vacuum.return_to_base
function.description: Tells the vacuum cleaner to return to its dock.

function.name: vacuum.send_command
function.description: Sends a command to the vacuum cleaner.

function.name: vacuum.start
function.description: Starts or resumes the cleaning task.

function.name: vacuum.set_fan_speed
function.description: Sets the fan speed of the vacuum cleaner.

description.example: Meeting to provide technical review for 'Phoenix' design.

function.description: Lists events on a calendar within a time range.
